title: EP 17: Katrina Schabacker, FNP-BC – Not All Heroes Wear Capes
description:
Not everybody can display strength in stressful times unlike a few, whom you call a ‘real hero’. Katrina has proved herself to be one during the pandemic. She has been a true frontline warrior with her great contribution to the well-being of mankind in those uncertain times. Every day she was combating death, trying to save the lives of people, but never chose to step down.

Katrina Schabacker is Steve’s wife. She is a healthcare professional. Starting as a CNA, she has come a long way in her career. Now, she is a Family Nurse Practitioner at Marcotte Medical Group, SC.

A proud mother, supportive wife, and dedicated nurse has a lot in store to share with you all. In this episode of The Tactical Entrepreneur podcast, Steve and Katrina walk back to their past, reminiscing the journey and all the hurdles they got through. Be it supporting an entrepreneur partner to accomplishing feats in her nursing career, she has always been a true warrior. Tune in to hear the story of an “unsung hero” and acknowledge her selfless service to people.

 

What You Will Learn:

  • What challenges Katrina faced as a nurse practitioner during the pandemic.
  • How she stayed committed to her role in such a difficult time.
  • Why nursing is more of a ‘calling’ than just a career choice.
  • And much more!

 

Favorite Quote:

“It’s very rewarding to come alongside patients that have been struggling with anxiety and depression, especially this post-pandemic environment that we're in right now.”

              -Katrina Schabacker

 

How To Get Involved:

Find Katrina on LinkedIn, Instagram, and Facebook.

Steve Schabacker is the co-founder of Sheepdog Firearms and an entrepreneur, bestselling author, and marketer. Between his business and his content, Steve is educating firearm owners and armed professionals and setting a new standard for shops and training centers in the industry.

You can visit Sheepdog Firearms online or reach out directly to Steve at sschabacker@outlook.com.

Check out this podcast on Apple Podcasts - don’t forget to subscribe, rate, and review!
